SEARCH
Package service

Class HdbOfficerService

java.lang.Object
service.UserService
service.HdbOfficerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplyableService, IAuthService, IEligibilityCheck, IPasswordService, IProjectView
public class HdbOfficerService extends UserService implements IApplyableService, IEligibilityCheck, IProjectView
Provides services specific to HDB Officers, handling project viewing, application processing, and enquiry handling.

    • applyForProject

      public boolean applyForProject(User user, Project project)
      Officers cannot apply for projects. This method always returns false.
      Specified by:
      applyForProject in interface IApplyableService
      Parameters:
      user - The User applying.
      project - The Project being applied for.
      Returns:
      true if the application was successful, false otherwise.

      public Application getApplicationStatus(User user)
      Retrieves application status. Not applicable for officers.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The current Application object, or null if none found.

    • submitEnquiry

      public Enquiry submitEnquiry(User user, Project project, String message)
      Submits a new enquiry response. Officers can reply to enquiries.

      Parameters:

      project - The Project the enquiry is about.

      Returns:

      Specified by:

      Adds a reply to an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to reply to.

      Returns:

    • processApplication

      public boolean processApplication(String applicationId, HdbOfficer officer, boolean approve)
      Processes an application (approve or reject).
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to process.
      officer - The officer processing the application.
      approve - true to approve, false to reject.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise.

    • processWithdrawalRequest

      public boolean processWithdrawalRequest(String applicationId, HdbOfficer officer, boolean approve)
      Processes a withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application with withdrawal request.
      officer - The officer processing the request.
      approve - true to approve withdrawal, false to reject it.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
